archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Conduct Maturity Technical Reviews
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Perform technical reviews within organization and organization stakeholders

properties.value: Conduct Maturity Technical Reviews Process assesses the maturity assessment that is requires for the technology dimension. This review requires a different set of questions and actions to get the answers that are more technical in nature such as : Reviewing existing tools and systems for fitness for purpose, obsolescence, current licenses and support contracts, trained users.
